message:
You have 30 seconds till the next notification in which case  
“immediate” will be set to true … this behavior  
was implemented so you can be notified about the time elapsed so you get a sense  
where you stand in the shutdown process, time wise. Put it simply it’s a convenience  
thing… bottom line NOTHING will get  
yanked until YOUR code returns control from Stop … put thread.sleep for hours  
and your AppDomain will live for hours… the shutdown thread will not get  
aborted after 30 sec ...  
as far as “power loss” well there is nothing really you can do about it  
regardless of framework used :)
